divs: sighting detailsstepped outside @ 3:28 to have a smoke & noticed object, thougt it most likly a star or distant aircraft in se sky about 30 degrees above horizon, made note of time. went outside again at approx. 5:15, object was still there, watched with naked eyes(5 min.) then with 15x binoculars. managed to get my mother out to observe it and she was as intrigued as i (unusual in itself). object was distant (at lest 5 miles to low orbit) and appeared round or possibly elongated diamond about 1\2 the size of venus which was also visible to the left in the east. at times a small, "steady" white light would briefly appear right under the object(for 15 to 30 sec.)object seemed to flash a bright white light at irregular intervals and had prismatic like sparkle- emiting beautiful bright-vivid colors across the visible spectrum. i took several pictures with a sony handi-cam but object just looks like a regular star -exactly like the picture sent in by previous wa witness. i watched the object until it faded - like a star does with the rising sun. i plan on creating a graphic to relay what i saw soon, and might submit later if anyone is interested perhaps a satellite in geo-sync. orbit? it was beautiful to watch - needless to say i'll be looking for it to show up again. thank you
Summary: Star-Like(1/2 size of Venus), stationary, multi-colored-spakling like a diamond.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around September 12th 2009
